channel.title: Stop with Ivana
channel.link:
http://ivanapazek.com/Intro.mp3 en-us Learning to Stop to go Further, Faster Ivana Pazek More studies are being done about the benefits of stopping. Stopping to meditate, exercise, smell the flowers, distrupt our regular patterns in any form. This habit not only increases effectivness in our everyday activities, but also the creativity and satisfaction of what we are doing. More studies are being done about the benefits of stopping. no
Pod #1 Intro: Stopping Process Introductory recording to Stop with Ivana podcast, Season 1. In this recording you will learn about the overall process of STOPPING, get clear on its core competencies, as well as what is stopping you from moving forward.
